text: When cloning a template it writes (clone) in paranthesis while a the same time making it read with the notice that parentesis are not allowed :thinking_face:...if they are not allowed, they should not be used here as well, so i would suggest using a underscore or something like that.

I think the admin setting for "Edit HubDB Tables" should be changed to "Create HubDB Tables" Currently I am on a portal with read, write, and publish access, but I cannot create a table in their HubDB area. Seems confusing to have it say "Edit HubDB Tables" when you have a checkbox for "write" permissions already.
Would love to be able to sort the hubdb tables by name rather than recently updated
